Changeset.Change: correctly pass post parameter array in wsrest call
support POST request from FulltextIndex query
WSRest call support port and bug fix
Accounting support
Some classes now implement Serializable
Bug fix.
Added nodename on event info
revert rename instead of copy/delete at FileTransferPlanElement
Corrected needed variables for the following filters: ParameterSerializationFilter, ParameterXPathFilter, ParameterXsltFilter, ParameterXsltFrom1DArrayFilter, ParameterXsltTo1DArrayFilter
Added ParameterArrayEvaluationFilter which is used to evaluate a DataTypeArray using the values of a collection of NamedDataTypes.
Update with the new interface of ITCPConnectionManagerEntry and ITCPDataConnectionManagerEntry
load monitoring of execution node
transition to slf4j
Mavenized
Improved node progress and error reporting
Output store mode option for ftp
Added long datatype
Compliance with version 1.1 of gRS2
Added support to utilize host info for resource matching
Added support to locate action elements within a plan
Fixed attachment handling
Added foreach-like condition to iterate over array values
Added generic event emission filter
Removed runtime dependency to Workflow Engine to break deployment dependency resolution cycle
